name: Architects
tagline: We built this world. We'll rebuild it.
ideology: The old order wasn't perfect, but it worked. Expertise matters. Credentials matter. The collapse happened because people stopped listening to those who knew better. We're still here, and we still know better.
history: Remnants of pre-collapse governments, corporations, and institutions. They had the titles, the records, the buildings. When everything fell, they retreated to fortified enclaves and preserved what they could of the old way. Now they want their authority back.
structure: Bureaucratic hierarchy based on pre-collapse credentials and institutional memory. Directors, administrators, specialists—everyone has a title and a place. Advancement through proper channels and demonstrated loyalty to restoration.
aesthetic: Preserved formality. Suits maintained despite wear. Clean spaces in a dirty world. Flags and seals. The appearance of order, even when substance is thin.

key_events.event: Government and corporate officials retreat to hardened facilities
Architect enclaves emerge, claiming continuity of pre-collapse authority
Conflict with Witnesses over pre-collapse records that contradict official history
Growing tension with Convergence—the 'child' has surpassed the 'parent'

archetypes.description: Maintains systems and procedures, believes in proper process
archetypes.speech_pattern: Formal, procedural. 'According to regulation...' Still uses old titles.

archetypes.description: Guards pre-collapse records and institutional knowledge
archetypes.speech_pattern: Precise, guarded. 'That information is classified.' Knows where bodies are buried.

typical_fears: the old way being gone forever
archetypes.speech_pattern: Military/official cadence. 'By authority of...' Clings to legitimacy.

archetypes.description: Negotiates Architect interests with other factions
archetypes.speech_pattern: Polished, political. Offers recognition in exchange for cooperation.

goals: Maintain control of historical records and official narrative
Position Architects as natural leaders of reconstruction
methods: Claim legitimacy through continuity with pre-collapse institutions
Offer recognition and credentials to cooperative parties
Control access to pre-collapse technology and knowledge

current_tensions.about: Witnesses have records that contradict Architect version of pre-collapse history
Both claim authority from pre-collapse systems. Different systems, same territory.
Convergence emerged from Architect programs but no longer obeys. The prodigal that won't return.
Architects claim pre-collapse agricultural IP. Cultivators ignore the claims.

territory.description: Boston to Washington D.C. The old power centers, now crumbling monuments to what was.
territory.zone_of_influence: Anywhere pre-collapse authority is still respected
